Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: grossman83
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I've been going through about 1 compact camera a year for 5 years now. The failure mode of those is always that the telescoping lens assembly stops working either because of grit in the gears or stripped gears. I bought this camera specifically because it is sealed.It's so sealed in fact that it's the perfect adventure camera. My favorite trick is to dunk it in a beer at a party and then snap a shot.Image quality is great in high light conditions, but due to small sensor size it's pretty grainy in low light.PROBLEM:The only problem with this camera is that while shooting video, one cannot zoom or the video goes out of focus until one has stopped changing the zoom setting. This makes it difficult to do shots of something coming toward or going away from the camera. While it's not a deal killer, it is disappointing. Here is a video I shot that should give you an idea of what I'm talking about.[...]

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix XP150
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: A bit hesitant in purchasing this item after reading the reviews, seems that some people had problems with the camera not being water proof as advertised.  I did NOT experience this problem.  I found the camera to be all it was advertised and then some. Love this camera.  It did remain water proof and functioned admirably! Even found the battery life to be adequate and a bit more than expected.  Used the camera both in the pool and out in the ocean on snorkeling trips, dolphin dives, and even surfing! I have some fantastic and memorable pics that my family and I will certainly cherish.  This camera exceeded my expectations and was definitely worth the purchase price.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: The camera was just like any other waterproof camera, up until I took it into the ocean. It says waterproof up to the 33 ft, I barely went into water that was 3 ft and it crapped out on me. Water got into the battery compartment.

Reviews.Title: Total waste of money. Poor quality & leaks!
Reviews.Author: rs11gps
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Palau. No scuba, just snorkling. I worked for about 30 minutes, then fried itself !!I read the reviews before using it, and was careful checking the seals and locking the latches. About 30 minutes into snapshots, the lcd screen went blank and the camera stopped operating. I swam back to the boat, dried the camera off, and openned the door. I was greeted by a slight whiff of burned electronics, and a little trickle of water coming out of the case!  AAAaaarrrggghhh !!!!  There goes my photos for the trip.Just so you know, I am in my 50's and have used many Minolta, Nikon and Canon cameras for decades. My current SLR is a Canon 7D. I KNOW how to be careful with them.Instead of enjoying my island photo expedition, I watched the other tourists happily snapping away with ther GOOD cameras, while I sat there with an inert Fuji lump of worthless plastic.Now I am home, and TRY to find a Fujifilm consumer service line to call?  Yea, right...  IF I can track them down, I expect to hear: well, it IS an underwater camera... no guarantees. Sorry, we keep your money, you keep the lump of plastic.Recommendation: If you think about buying the XP-150, you might as well burn several $100 dollar bills instead... save the time and aggravation of expecting it to actually work.p.s. the only reason I gave it a "1" is that there is no zero rating.

Reviews.Title: This Camera Will Leak!!!
Reviews.Author: wrdcreater
Reviews.Content: This camera was awesome until it leaked, and now it is worthless!  Directions were followed carefully, no user error, and the product failed!  Also killed my 32 GB SD card!!  For less than 6 months of use, no damage to camera and it failed!  Do not trust this camera to be submerged!  My two cents.  Waiting to see if Fuji will replace, or repair.

Reviews.Title: camera did not work underwater
Reviews.Author: Ginger McInnis
Reviews.Content: First time I took it under water it did not work.I followed all directions and the seals did not keep the water out. I only went 6 feet under water.

Reviews.Title: Go for something else even if you have to pay a bit more
Reviews.Author: Amazon User
Reviews.Content: Took it with me to two beach vacations and I'm disappointed.  I have to be careful not to shake too much underwater or the water may leak through.  And that's hard to do when you're trying to swim.  Ruined one set of pictures already since the water leaked in and we didn't take it deep at all.  The SD card worked again once it dried off.  But I wouldn't risk putting an expensive SD card on this camera.Even when the camera works, I can tell it's a bit moist inside where the battery/memory card goes after a day of use underwater use at the beach.  Just waiting for the next time it ruins another set of pictures or even the memory card.  It sucks because when it does, my entire set of vacation pictures will go too :(Camera still works but I don't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Fun camera!!
Reviews.Author: Deanra
Reviews.Content: Just returned from our cruise to Bermuda where we used this camera in the pool and the ocean! The kids used the video feature while going down water slides too! Perfect for taking photos while in the water!!! I love it but my kids love it more!!!!

Reviews.Title: totally unreliable
Reviews.Author: constantine
Reviews.Content: it leaked sea water the very first day i used it underwater.. totally disapointed at the manufacturers lack of credibility..

Reviews.Title: superior
Reviews.Author: Moises Benites Barron
Reviews.Content: Better han I expected. I usted under the sea, river and pool. Very good product. I will recomend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Heidi Lurie
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I like this camera. I bought it because I have 3 kids who like to hold the camera and this seems to be living up to the challenge. The settings are nice and it seems easy to use.

Reviews.Title: FujiFilm FinePix XP150
Reviews.Author: Rogelio J Cavazos Davila
Reviews.Content: This camera is a fraud, I purchased it for my Orlando vacations, took it to Blizzard Beach, water got into the Memory Card chamber and ruined it. Big disappointment, I'm returning the product and hope to get a complete refund. Don't buy it!

Reviews.Title: blurry in low light, confusing UI
Reviews.Author: Brian Olson
Reviews.Content: So far so good, but it has a "silent mode" that is confusing that disables flash as well as beeps. There is also a way to just turn off the beeping and clicking noises but still let it flash. My indoors shots with it have been good enough, but not really good. I'm still hoping to get some good scenery with it on the upcoming trip to see some natural wonders.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP CMOS
High Quality Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens
4-Proof Protection: Waterproof 33', Shockproof 6.5', Freezeproof 14, Dustproof
Full HD Movies
GPS with Compass and Photo navigation
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix XP150 Digital Camera (Black)
